title: Warisi
author: Warisi
content: If you've been scammed by a fake  cryptocurrency investment website that promises huge returns on investment or been a victim of a sha Zhu phan romantic scam.Give a rating on and make a report of the investment website used and also provide the details of the scammer or scammers on : Bi t.ly/ 3i3b ep7They are a company which is helping takedown scamming websites,to prevent others from falling victim in future.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: Warisi on November 26, 2022, 11:36:37 PMIf you've been scammed by a fake  cryptocurrency investment website that promises huge returns on investment or been a victim of a sha Zhu phan romantic scam.Give a rating on and make a report of the investment website used and also provide the details of the scammer or scammers on : Bi t.ly/ 3i3b ep7They are a company which is helping takedown scamming websites,to prevent others from falling victim in future.Your thread is questionable and risky why are you using redirection and the redirection link to a scanner for a download, the site disable your QR code maybe because of the malicious code embedded in it, you need to explain it and why just you name the site instead of creating a QR code this is very suspiciousQuoteThe QR Code Campaign has been disabled for some reason.Your QR Code Reader/Scanner is working fine.
